name: Just Dodge
description:
A prototype dodging game

Controls:

A - D / Left - Right arrow key to move

Esc to pause and bring up menu

Assets: made with unity using:

- Ultimate UI: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/ultimate-game-ui-53973 (for buttons)

- Free Planet Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/planets-with-space-b... (other sprites)
